title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.14 - Class SD saline surface waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.14 - Class SD saline surface waters

State Regulations

The best usage of Class SD waters is fishing. These
waters shall be suitable for fish, shellfish and wildlife survival. This
classification may be given to those waters that, because of natural or
man-made conditions, cannot meet the requirements for fish
propagation. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
